Issue.creator: doowb
Issue.summary: Cannot run peer because error when setting up MSP of type bccsp from directory /etc/hyperledger/msp: signing identity expired 2623h16m32.675625837s ago
Issue.description: Cannot run peer because error when setting up MSP of type bccsp from directory /etc/hyperledger/msp: signing identity expired 2623h16m32.675625837s ago I'm not really sure where else to ask this since I recently started using hyperledger technologies and I'm not exactly sure how to debug an error like this. My main goal was to use version 1.1.0-alpha so I could write chaincode in node.js. Thanks, Brian >
